item.title: Under the hood: the FairPlay DApp (with FAQs)
item.description: In this article, I will explain the technical details behind the FairPlay DApp. If you haven’t tried this DApp, please have a look at FairPlay: decentralized prize drawing for e-commerce. Talk is cheap, show me your code! Sure, please see here. Any pull request or issue is welcome ;) Overview This DApp is based on standard web technologies. It uses the web3-cmt.js JavaScript library to interact with the smart contract.
